name: mapcomplete
description: A small website to edit OSM easily

scripts.start: parcel *.html UI/** Logic/** assets/** assets/**/** assets/**/**/** vendor/* vendor/*/*
scripts.optimize-images: cd assets/generated/ &&  find -name '*.png' -exec optipng '{}' \; && echo 'PNGs are optimized'
scripts.generate: npm run generate:included-images && npm run generate:layouts && npm run generate:editor-layer-index
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ npm run generate && parcel build --public-url ./ *.html assets/** assets/**/** assets/**/**/** vendor/* vendor/*/*
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run generate && npm run build && rm -rf .cache
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prepare-deploy && rm -rf /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/Staging/* && cp -r dist/* /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/Staging/ && cd /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/ && git add * && git commit -m 'New MapComplete Version' && git push && cd - && npm run clean
scripts.deploy:production: npm run prepare-deploy && npm run optimize-images && rm -rf /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/MapComplete/* && cp -r dist/* /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/MapComplete/ && cd /home/pietervdvn/git/pietervdvn.github.io/ && git add * && git commit -m 'New MapComplete Version' && git push && cd - && npm run clean
